caption:
This photograph shows an older man working in a laboratory setting. He is dressed in a white lab coat and is wearing glasses with thick black rims. The man is carefully handling test tubes filled with various colored substances; he appears to be inserting or removing test tubes from a large rack filled with dozens of similar test tubes, all capped with white stoppers.

The background is softly focused, revealing additional laboratory equipment and tools. The lighting is somewhat dim, highlighting the intense concentration of the man and the meticulous care with which he works. The photo conveys a sense of professionalism and dedication to scientific research.
title: EPA Gulf Coast Water Supply Research Laboratory, Dauphin Island: bacteriology lab. Here the bacteria content of water is studied with relation to the shellfish industry.
